Package hep.aida.ref.remote.testRemote

Class Summary
AidaTreeClientTest This is a very simple AidaTreeClient that just delegates most of the methods to the TestUtils class.
AidaTreeServantTest This is a very simple implementation of AidaTreeServant that just delegates most of the methods to the TestUtils class.
AidaTreeServerTest This is a very simple AidaTreeServer that just delegates most of the methods to the TestUtils class.
RemoteClientTest This is class extends the RemoteClient to create very simple AidaTreeServerTest and is used to test the RemoteClient - RemoteMutableStore interaction.
RemoteManagedObjectTest RemoteManagedObject that can be used for tests
RemoteMutableStoreTest  
RemoteMutableStoreTestFactory  
TestMain We do main tests here.
TestUtils This class provides static utilities like strin-to-array and array-to-string conversion for manipulating with Paths.
